notes.title: Exploitability

product.name: MicroStation Connect - â€¢ v10.17.0.209 and prior

notes.text: The affected product is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow when a malformed design (DGN) file is parsed. This may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.CVE-2022-40201 has been assigned to this vulnerability. A CVSS v3 base score of 7.8 has been calculated; the CVSS vector string is (AV:L/AC:L/PR:N/UI:R/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H).
notes.title: Vulnerability Summary

remediations.details: Bentley Systems has implemented multiple validation checks within the DGN platform when processing malformed DGNs. Bentley Systems recommends users update to the latest version of the MicroStation Connect: Update 17.1
For more information and MicroStation updates, contact Bentley Support.
